doc:
Don Knotts https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Don_Knotts 0 Jesse Donald Knotts (July 21, 1924 – February 24, 2006) was an American actor and comedian, best known as Deputy Sheriff Barney Fife on The Andy Griffith Show, a 1960s sitcom for which he earned five Emmy Awards. He also starred in multiple comedic films, including playing Luther Heggs in The Ghost and Mr. Chicken (1966) and Henry Limpet in The Incredible Mr. Limpet (1964). He also portrayed landlord Ralph Furley on the sitcom Three's Company. In 1979 TV Guide ranked him #27 on its 50 Greatest TV Stars of All Time list. Jesse_Donald_Knotts ( July_21_,_1924 – February_24 , 2006 ) was an_American_actor_and_comedian , best_known as Deputy_Sheriff_Barney_Fife on The_Andy_Griffith_Show , a_1960s_sitcom for which he earned five_Emmy_Awards . He also starred in multiple_comedic_films , including playing Luther_Heggs in The_Ghost and Mr._Chicken ( 1966_) and Henry_Limpet in The_Incredible_Mr._Limpet ( 1964_) . He also portrayed landlord_Ralph_Furley on the_sitcom_Three 's_Company . In 1979_TV_Guide ranked him #_27 on its_50_Greatest_TV_Stars of All_Time_list .
